sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom";

import {
  Button,
  Container,
  Dropdown,
  Image,
  Menu,
  Input,
  Icon,
  Label,
} from "semantic-ui-react";
export default function Navbar(props) {
  return (
    <Segment basic textAlign="center">
      <Menu inverted fixed="top" size="massive">
        <Menu.Item>
          <Image
            as={NavLink}
            to="/home"
            src="images/naxus12.PNG"
            size="small"
          />
        </Menu.Item>

        <Menu.Menu position="right">
          <Menu.Item className="d-flex justify-content-end">
            <Input
              size="huge"
              className="icon"
              icon="search"
              placeholder="Searching?"
            />
          </Menu.Item>
          <Menu.Item>
            <Icon name="user outline" size="large" />
            <Dropdown item text="Account">
              <Dropdown.Menu>
                <Dropdown.Item>
                  <Button primary size="small" as={NavLink} to="/loginscreen">
                    Login
                    <Icon name="sign in" />
                  </Button>
                </Dropdown.Item>
                <Dropdown.Item>
                  <Button primary size="small" as={NavLink} to="/signup">
                    Sign-up <Icon name="signup" />
                  </Button>
                </Dropdown.Item>
              </Dropdown.Menu>
            </Dropdown>
          </Menu.Item>
          <Menu.Item>
            <Button
              backgroundcolor="grey"
              inverted
              color="black"
              as={NavLink}
              to="/myfavorites"
            >
              <Icon name="heart outline" />
              My Favorite
            </Button>
          </Menu.Item>
          <Menu.Item>
            <Button
              backgroundcolor="grey"
              inverted
              color="black"
              as={NavLink}
              to="/cart"
            >
              <Icon name="shopping cart" />
              Cart
            </Button>
          </Menu.Item>
        </Menu.Menu>
      </Menu>
      <Divider horizontal>Or</Divider>
      <Menu style={mystyle} size="large">
        <Menu.Item>
          <Button as={NavLink} to="/naxusclub" inverted>
            NAXUS CLUB
          </Button>
        </Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item>
          <Button as={NavLink} to="/campaings" inverted>
            CAMPAİNGS
          </Button>
        </Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item>
          <Button as={NavLink} to="/brands" inverted>
            BRANDS
          </Button>
        </Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item>
          <Button as={NavLink} to="/services" inverted>
            SERVİCES
          </Button>
        </Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item>
          <Button as={NavLink} to="/opportunityoftheday" inverted>
            OPPORTUNİTY OF THE DAY
          </Button>
        </Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item>
          <Button as={NavLink} to="/help" inverted>
            HELP
          </Button>
        </Menu.Item>
        {/* <Container className="d-flex justify-content-end">
           <Button backgroundcolor = "grey" inverted color='black'> <Icon name='shopping cart' />Sepetim</Button> 
            <Button.Group style={loginbuttonsstyle}> 
            <Button>Giriş Yap</Button>
            <Button.Or />
            <Button positive>Kaydol</Button>
            </Button.Group>
            </Container> */}
      </Menu>
    </Segment>
  );
}
